simrun2.reduced_model.get_kernel.get_kernel_C2_grid¶

simrun2.reduced_model.get_kernel.get_kernel_C2_grid(keys_to_synapse_activation_data=['synapse_activation', 'binned_t1', 'EI', 'proximal', 'EXC', 'prox', 'synapse_activation', 'binned_t1', 'EI', 'proximal', 'INH', 'prox'], synapse_activation_window_width=80, synapse_activation_window_min=None, synapse_activation_window_max=None, output_window_min=255, output_window_max=265, refractory_period=0, normalize_group_size=True, test_size=0.4, verbosity=2, lookup_series_stepsize=5, cache=True, mdbs='mdbs_inhrobert')[source]¶
